meanings.sent1: She prevented the cat from running outside.
meanings.sent2: The lock on the door prevented any intruders from entering.
meanings.sent3: The superhero prevented the villain's escape with a clever trap.
meanings.sent4: His quick thinking prevented a disaster from unfolding.
meanings.sent5: The vaccine prevented the spread of the disease effectively.

meanings.sent1: The fence prevented the dog from wandering off.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise can prevent health issues.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella prevented the raindrops from ruining her hair.
meanings.sent4: His warning prevented a misunderstanding between friends.
meanings.sent5: Wearing a helmet prevented a serious injury during the accident.

meanings.definition: To hinder or obstruct something from occurring
meanings.sent1: The heavy traffic prevented us from reaching the airport on time.
meanings.sent2: The thick fog prevented clear visibility on the road.
meanings.sent3: The tangled wires prevented the computer from turning on.
meanings.sent4: The language barrier prevented effective communication.
meanings.sent5: The closed gate prevented access to the garden.
